content: This is brilliant. Especially because I can totally sympathize. I’ve been jumping from temp job to temp job since I moved down south (after 17 years in the same job up north) and my mentality has always been, “Keep your head down, do your job the best you can, go home at the end of the day.” I don’t want to be part of your “events”, don’t wish to participate in a pot luck lunch/dinner and for the love of all that is holy, don’t involve me in any kind of holiday skit.
